description: Are you so busy that 24 hours a day is just not enough for you? Start tracking your time with Timebits. You'll be surprised on what exactly your most precious resource is wasted. Timebits seamlessly helps you to organize daily activities and turns time management into a fun and involving process. It adds location info to every record so you can see where it started. UI is designed to reduce time needed to switch between tasks down to few seconds. Clear and simple screens don't distract you from the business - at the end, this App is just an instrument to make your life a bit better.---------------- VERSION 1.0.2 highlights: pause button, subcategories, in-place editing, improved speed. ---------------- VERSION 1.0.3 highlights: optimized for webOS 1.4. See LINKS section below to get more information about Timebits. ---------------- VERSION 1.0.4 highlights: integration with default navigation software
